ewani awasthawaka di sirasa pamanak nowa anekuth madhaya aayathana da siya prawruththi sambandhatha yoda ganimin kala sewaya agaya kala yuthuya.eheth eewa da nisi paridi sidu wuwa yayi kiyannata nohakiya.mokada me kisiwak atham dushkara pradeshawalata nopamina rupagatha kirim pahasu than walin nawathunu bawinya.ewa nawatha ethan hi sita beda harima pawarenne yalith supurudu sadharana nowana kusitha kramawedayatamaya.

ee anuwa sabawinma snowdan sathu sesu lipigonu yanu madhyawediyakuta laba gatha haki agana sampathak ma wanne ya.amerikawe nithi wirodhi wada lokayata helidaraw kirimen jiwitha tharjanawalata muhuna dun snowdan me wana witath randi sitinne rusiyawe handuna nogath pradeshayakaya.amerikawen pitaman wu pasu amerikanu madhyayakata laba dun palamuwani sammkha sakachchawa sanituhan karamin enbisi sewawe brayan wiliyams samaga adahas dakwu snowdan thama kisisethma rusiyanu oththukaruwaku nowanne yayi pawasa sitiye ya.thama rusiyawata kisiwak ragena noaa bawa sandahan kala ohu pitawa yana dinaka thamata rusiyawata laba dimata kisiwak da nathi bawa pawasuwe ya.eheth snowdan yanu rusiyawa wisin itha daksha lesa puhunu kala oththukaruwaku bawath ohuta daththa rashiyak thama manase gabada kara ganimata hakiyawa thibu bawatath kata katha pathiremin thibe.
mema parichichedayen kiyawenne dewiyan wahanse minisata balaya ha balathala laba dun bawaya.
